abstract.para: Gibbon is a graphical frontend for FIBS, the First Internet Backgammon Server or other compatible servers.

sect1.title: Einleitung
sect1.para: Gibbon is a graphical frontend for FIBS, the First Internet Backgammon Server or other compatible servers. You can play online against other players from all over the world.

SGF Gibbon uses the portable SGF format for saving files. This is the same format that GNU Backgammon GNU Backgammon uses. It is therefore easy for you to let GNU Backgammon analyse your matches after playing.

sect2.title: Gibbon on the Internet
sect2.para: You can find gibbon on various places on the internet:

listitem.para: http://gibbon.guido-flohr.net is the official homepage of gibbon.
On its Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/pages/Gibbon/201252806558402 you can follow gibbon and keep informed about new releases or other information.
Its Ohloh page http://www.ohloh.net/projects/gibbon2 is targetted at people interested in the development and source code of gibbon.

sect2.title: What does the name Gibbon mean?
sect2.para: It was one of the first words that came to my mind, when I thought about a name that resembles Guido, FIBS, backgammon, ...

sect2.title: Does FIBS Cheat?
sect2.para: After some research in various internet forums it is more than obvious that FIBS cheats. It discriminates dice whiners! The internet is full of hard-luck stories that definetly prove it. Dice whiners dance for a dozen rounds on a two-point board, while their opponents get sequences of ridiculously lucky rolls. Another interesting "feature" of FIBS' "random" number generator is that it gives significantly better rolls to the strong players, and the weak ones just don't have a chance to improve their game because of the bad numbers they roll. Isn't that unfair? Yes! But there is nothing that gibbon can do about it.

sect2.title: Starting gibbon from the application menu
sect2.para: Gnome If you use the Gnome desktop, you can start gibbon from the Applications menu by selecting GamesGibbon. For other systems, gibbon will be installed in a similar location.
